original_title: MY CATHOLIC FAMILY - ST. LOUIS DE MONTFORT
overview: Alex, Sarah, and friends learn about the life of St. Louis de Montfort in this engaging children's production. They discover his devotion to the Virgin Mary and find out why he called Christians to give Mary special honor. In this episode of My Catholic Family you'll find the perfect introduction to the unique spirituality of St. Louis-Marie de Montfort for children of all age
title: MY CATHOLIC FAMILY - ST. LOUIS DE MONTFORT
